The Role:We seek an exceptional, self-motivated and seasoned engineer who can join the Snaplogic snap and data team and be the critical player in building frameworks and services that connect data across different enterprise applications and databases running in production systems. We envision data that’s appropriately transformed and primed is available with a click in the destination systems and retains context and metadata for informed and responsible use in a seamless fashion to meet the necessary business and control requirements.You are a Principal Software Engineer who enjoys designing, developing, and maintaining modular, scalable, and performant data management solutions that meet a variety of integration and business use cases across many customers from different industries. Overall you take a deep sense of ownership, accountability, and pride.This is a remote role for candidates based in the United States with occasional travel required to our HQ in San Mateo, CA.What You'll Do:Develop data ingestion and transformation solutions optimized for performance scalability and efficiencyYou have a good understanding of open-source and third-party data technologiesEnsure solution design and architecture meets snaplogic and customer security and regulatory requirementsBuild and design applications such that the cost of change is minimumWe envision building frameworks that will scale code generationBuild Microservices based architecture that can scale vertically and horizontallyCycle between projects in weeks rather than years – continually learning about technologies, protocols and productsWhat We're Looking For:8+ years experience Experience working as a senior engineer on projects designing and developing solutions in the EtLT spaceYou have extensive experience with Java and/or Python, with an advanced understanding of object-oriented programming, software complexity, and writing efficient secure codeExperience with distributed databases, especially NoSQLExperience with two or more of the following: Snowflake, Apache Kafka, Amazon Redshift, AWS S3, Google Cloud Storage, Microsoft Azure, SalesforceYou absolutely understand the importance of testing, tooling, and debugging to ensure market-leading code quality required for successful enterprise products and maintenanceYou have a customer-centric view of products and processesAPI first design approachYou are an opinionated, assertive, collaborative, and positive thinkerYou can take an ambiguous problem and navigate with clarityYou are a master builder and an excellent team playerYou coach other fellows engineers and help them go to the next levelNice To Have:Experience with Machine Learning and Statistical analysis is a plusExperience with front-end development is a plusWhy Join Now:There's never been a better time to join SnapLogic. Here are a few reasons why:Perks And Benefits: The list includes, but is not limited to: competitive salary, flexible PTO (USA employees), comprehensive healthcare; 401(k); FSA and supplemental insurance; paid parental leave; wellness and fitness reimbursements; gym and lunch on site (HQ); remote/hybrid work for majority of roles.Company Momentum: Industry experts have consistently recognized our company, products, customers, and employees as best-in-class, from our year-over-year Leadership in Gartner’s iPaaS Magic Quadrant, to our 2021 CODiE Award win, to our recognition as a 2022 Bay Area Top Workplace.Hot Market Opportunity: Leading organizations are embracing the cloud, data, and AI to rethink and rewire their businesses. According to industry analysts, the integration market alone is growing four times faster than the overall software market, approaching more than $5 billion in revenue.Innovative Product: SnapLogic is the only company to provide a single, unified platform for all of a company’s integration and automation needs: application integration, data integration, API management, B2B integration, and data engineering.World Class Customers: Hundreds of customers around the globe trust SnapLogic to handle their enterprise integration and automation needs. Our customers come first, and we’re proud of SnapLogic's industry-leading customer retention rate of over 95%.SnapLogic is headquartered in San Mateo, CA with offices in New York, NY; London, UK; and Hyderabad, India.To all recruitment agencies: SnapLogic does not accept unsolicited agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to SnapLogic employees or to any other company location. SnapLogic is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes and will not pay fees to any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with the company. SnapLogic provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws. SnapLogic complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including, but not limited to, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training. SnapLogic expressly prohibits any form of unlawful employee harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status. Improper interference with the ability of SnapLogic employees to perform their expected job duties is absolutely not tolerated.
